merely.translation[0].definitions[0].def: used to emphasize how small or unimportant something or someone is
merely.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: He’s merely a boy – you can’t expect him to understand.
merely.translation[0].definitions[1].def: used to emphasize that nothing more than what you say is involved
merely.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: He merely shrugged and walked away.
